attributes.action: Suspend Parliament until November the 1st to ensure the Referendum is upheld.
attributes.additional_details:
Cameron’s speech “ No Deal will be the default option.”

Article 50, going against Mays Withdrawal Act.
The Extension.

All times where a No Deal scenario has either been mentioned or ignored.
attributes.background: As we know the Referendum result was told it would be honoured with No Deal as a default option. This has been implemented throughout the course of 3 years with government votes on the issues as a Deal has not yet been made. Due to recent events it’s time for the people to control the outcome.
